verses.name: Jeremiah 35:11
verses.text: But it came to pass, when Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon came up into the land, that we said, Come, and let us go to Jerusalem for fear of the army of the Chaldeans, and for fear of the army of the Syrians: so we dwell at Jerusalem.

verses.name: Jeremiah 35:12
verses.text: Then came the word of the Lord unto Jeremiah, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 35:13
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord of hosts, the God of Israel; Go and tell the men of Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem, Will ye not receive instruction to hearken to my words? saith the Lord.
